posts.body: For a life in the fast lane: The Mercedes-AMG A 35 and A 45 S Hatchback make a real statement in terms of comfort and performance. The latest technologies, individual design and uncompromising driving pleasure make the Hatchbacks the perfect...
posts.author: Jack Black test

posts.body: As impressive as ever, as individual as never before: As impressive as ever, as individual as never before: the Mercedes-AMG A 35 Sedan knows how to impress with numerous options that show off its compact, elegant form to even greater advantage...
posts.author: John Snow

posts.body: You can see how much fun the Mercedes-AMG C 43 is just by looking at it: The striking chrome AMG cooler grill, whose dominance is further accentuated by the front apron with sporty air-inlets, will set the heart racing before you even get inside.
posts.author: Sarah Jones
